short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the link to the current GitHub issue in org/repo#issue format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies an issue/pull request in a 'short code' format that is easily used in markdown for referencing in other GitHub issues, documentation, etc. Provides plain text and HTML versions.
